CustomField.description: Tracks the number of pending child agent executions dispatched in the current supervisor round. Used for atomic fan-in coordination in Supervised workflow mode. Decremented atomically with FOR UPDATE when each child completes; when reaching zero, the next supervisor turn is enqueued. Analogous to PendingAsyncToolCount__c for async tools.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of child agents still pending completion for the current supervisor round. Only used in Supervised workflow mode.
CustomField.label: Pending Workflow Child Count
